No bargains break that are not this day made;
This day

Set a huge mountain ’tween my heart and tongue.

Art thou here yet?

Run to the Capitol
And so return to you

column1: There is much matter to be heard and learned.
(To Duke) You to your former honor I bequeath;
Your patience and your virtue well deserves it.
(To Orlando) You to a love that your true faith doth
merit.
(To Oliver) You to your land
allies.
(To Silvius) You to a long and well-deservèd bed.
(To Touchstone) And you to wrangling
loving voyage
Is but for two months victualled. - So to your
pleasures.
I am for other than for dancing measures.
[Duke Senior:] Stay
[Jaques:] To see no pastime
I'll stay to know at your abandoned cave.

Better to leave undone than by our deed

column1: Shall be a means to further my devise
Therefore I pray thee Mendacio go presently
Run you vile Ape.

[Lingua:] What dost thou stand?
[Mendacio:] Till I know what to do.
[Lingua:] <span class=""quote"">S'precious 'tis true
So might thou finely o'er-run thine errand.
Hast to my Chest.
[Mendacio:] Ay
[Lingua:] There shalt thou find
A gorgeous Robe
Convey them hither nimbly

column7: line 152 [normalised spelling].";"1627";"1627";"1627";"1627";"HAS SEVERAL LEXIAS!";"[Foreste:] Her soul is gone!

column1: Hah? whether is it gone? O vast suspense!
Madness succeeds inquiry. Fools of Nature!
What Ancestor (that died long since) hath brought
Us news of his abode! or told us how
They use him in the other world? O this
Wild mystery so much concerneth Man:
That we would willingly dismiss suspense
With eyesight not with consequence. ";"";"King's Men / Blackfriars
